projArray.name: Assembler, Linker, Simulator
projArray.description: Command Line application that converted assembly language files from a provided ISA into object files, linked those object files together, and simulated the output of the resulting executable.

projArray.name: Crabster Exam Server
projArray.description: Randomized exam server used to administer exams to 2500+ students and 3+ classes per semester.

projArray.name: Image Resizer
projArray.description: Command Line application that uses a seam-carving algorithm to crop images in a .ppm format.

projArray.name: Kernel Fragments
projArray.description: Thread Library, Memory Manager (Pager), and Network File Server

projArray.name: Michigan Ticket App
projArray.description: Mobile application designed at the University of Michigan Hackathon to allow students to buy and sell their student football tickets.

projArray.name: MNIST Classifier
projArray.description: Single Layer Perceptron used to classify handwritten digits in the MNIST database.

projArray.name: Piazza Post Classifier
projArray.description: Trained classifier that uses a log-score algorithm to assign labels to the content of a piazza post.

projArray.name: Stock Market Simulator
projArray.description: Simulator that given timestamps, buy, and sell orders matches buyers to sellers and tracks the median purchase price of each stock.

projArray.name: Voluntutors
projArray.description: Web application for connecting volunteer tutors with schools/parents/students in low-income neighborhoods.
